Reviews.Title: great for the price, have space for improvement
Reviews.Author: Xiao Feng Lu
Reviews.Content: it works great during the day, night vision is kinda ok. image quality decrease significantly. it's a good deal though.

ProductInfo.Features:
1/3-Inch SONY Exview HAD CCD II; Enhanced Features and Fine Image Processor
1 Array IR Led; 3.6mm Lens
Color Mode: 650TVL; B/W Mode: 700TVL
The Array LED deliver high performance, compact and cost-effective solid-state lighting solutions to serve the high-end lighting market.
Vandal proof & water proof
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc GW162AR 700TVL 1/3-Inch Sony Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices Outdoor Security Camera with 1 Array IR LED and 3.6mm Wide Angle Lens (White/Blue)
